title: Brambly Hedge
overview: Adapted from the best selling books from Jill Barklem. The mouse families of the hedge share seasonal adventures, mishaps and marriages in eight exquisite half-hour films. Young Wilfred Toadflax and Primrose Woodmouse lead us through the travails, together with a regular cast which includes Basil, Lady Daisy, Mrs. Eyebright and Poppy, Mr. and Mrs. Toadflax, and Mr. and Mrs. Apple.
